::Eclipse/Wolveritron::

    No one had paid them any heed and they had got=
ten a call from Kluster, They both left the Council area.
  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: =
Tuesday, November 28, 2000 11:16 PM
  Subject: Re: CF Security Alert


  Wh=
istler, before complaining that you've been ignored, first take the 
  time=
 to see that KLUSTER HAS BEEN CALLING ALL THE MAXIMALS TO A 
  MEETING FOR =
THE LAST SEVERAL DAYS!!!

  I'm serious, this meeting is important. This go=
es to everyone. If you 
  have Maxi chars, GET TO THE SLAGGING MEETING.

  =
::Kluster::

  Kluster frowns, recieving Chordate's transmission. "I see. A=
llright, 
  put them on enemy. But if they approach, alert me. THe Maximals=
 are 
  having a meeting right now, but I'd appreciate it if you stayed and=
 
  watched the scanners."

  He growls, pushing a button near his seat. A =
transmission is sent out 
  to all Maximals, repeated over and over and ove=
r untill they would be 
  detected to be within the Cybertronian Fire. The =
message also played 
  over the intercom of the CF.

  "All Maximals, this =
is the fourth call. Get to the Cybertronian 
  Fire's conference room immed=
iately. This meeting is not optional."

  Kluster ends the transmission, si=
tting back in his chair. What kind 
  of a team was this? No wonder they ne=
eded help in the war. He looks 
  at the hologram of Koj, frowning.

  "Why=
 did you and Inu just steal supplies from the Cybertronian Fire?"








 =
 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
  > (I'm taking back cont=
rol of Chordate from Yanshosh)
  > 
  > 
  > Chordate:
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > C=
hordate sipped a cup of slightly heated energon.  It was about 
  five degr=
ees 
  > lower than the temperature needed to set the energon off into an 
=
  explosion.  
  > He spit his energon up on his lap, though he ignored tha=
t, and 
  looked at a 
  > monitor.
  > 
  > He saw Koj and Inu shoot open =
storage chamber and continued to 
  watch them 
  > leave the Cybertronian =
Fire.  He activated his comm. unit to 
  Kluster and Iron 
  > Raptor.
  > =

  > "Kluster, Iron Raptor, this is Chordate.  Those two new Maximals, 
  K=
oj and 
  > Inu, have just stolen quite a bit of supplies from the Cybertro=
nian 
  Fire, and 
  > in the direction they're heading, I can only see one=
 real important 
  thing, 
  > the Ark.  I'm going to place them on enemy."=
 he ended the 
  transmission.
  > 
  > He finished putting them on enemy o=
nly a cycle later, when a 
  thought popped 
  > into his head.  Ever since=
 that Predacon inflitrated the 
  Cybertronian Fire, 
  > the codes had nev=
er been changed.  The comm. frequencies and shield 
  > frequencies had, bu=
t nothing else.
  > 
  > He began working on that, knowing it would only ta=
ke a couple 
  cycles to set 
  > up the programs to randomly change the co=
des that would then send 
  all the new 
  > codes to those with the author=
ity.
  > 
  > (Such as, people, I can't tell who gets which codes because I=
 don't 
  know all 
  > the Maximals, but for something like emergency shut=
 off of all 
  systems in the 
  > CF, new recruits wouldn't have that.  Th=
at would be just Iron 
  Raptor, 
  > Kluster, and Chordate.  Please be log=
ical like that when Chordate 
  finishes 
  > the codes and I have him send=
 'em out.  Thank you)


        eGroups Sponsor
